products.name: Long-Lasting Foundation Set

products.name: Waterproof Mascara & Eyeliner Duo
products.description: A smudge-proof mascara and eyeliner combo that ensures perfect eye makeup even through tears.

products.description: A set of rich, high-pigment lipsticks in classic bridal shades for long-lasting color.

products.name: Full-Coverage Concealer Kit
products.description: A concealer kit that hides imperfections and dark circles for a flawless complexion.

products.name: Radiant Glow Highlighter Palette
products.description: A palette with multiple highlighter shades to add a radiant glow, perfect for a bride’s big day.

products.name: Bridal Hair Accessory Set

products.name: Ceramic Curling Iron Set
products.description: A ceramic curling iron for smooth, bouncy curls that last throughout the event.

products.name: Bridal Hair Pin Collection

products.name: Heat Protection Spray & Serum Duo
products.description: A spray and serum set that protects hair from heat damage while adding shine and softness.

products.name: Classic Bridal Veil & Tiara Kit
products.description: A traditional bridal veil and tiara combo, adding a royal touch to the wedding outfit.

products.name: Pearl Drop Earring Set
products.description: Elegant pearl drop earrings to complement any bridal outfit with grace.

products.name: Traditional Kundan Bridal Set

products.name: Crystal Bangle Set

products.name: Antique Gold Anklet Pair

products.name: Hydrating Face Mask Pack
